text: Staff was awesome.  They help my husband's little sister find the perfect prom dress. Thank you all!!!

text: They were so wonderful to work with! Very friendly and so helpful! Very knowledgeable and willing to make everything perfect! We are repeat customers and  will definitely use them again if formal wear is needed!

name: Oreo woods
text: I am so pleased with the tuxedo my son rented for his prom!  It was the perfect fit and he looked amazing!  I haven't found another store in town that could come close to the price of the tuxedo either.  We will be back!!!!

name: Jill
text: Beware of a change in rental return. They don’t go by what’s written on the original ticket. After my son’s prom, he did say it was due back between 12-2 Sunday. Their store isn’t even open Sundays! So I checked the original paperwork and it read due Monday. So the. I get charged $20 on top of the $160 already paid!  Btw no shoes included!!  What a rip off! I spoke to the manager and her claim was a yellow card was included, I told each and every one. What happened to customer service?!? Check around before you rent her and be wary of a change in co tract. Their no good for their ‘word’ even when it’s in writing!

resp.text: Hi Jill, We are sorry for the miscommunication. Your son was correct that we required tuxedos to be returned last week on Sunday between 12-3pm. This is not our normal hours of operation but due to high demand we are sometimes forced to add an extra day to our work week. If you have any other questions please reach out to us at 256-766-6214

name: Sherrie Behel
text: We had to change our venue for my daughters wedding reception due to CDC Covid-19 regulations.  Ended up in a gym but Party Pros came through and made it a fairytale venue!  Everyone involved was super nice and so helpful!!! If we ever need a rental service again, I’ll definitely choose them!  Highly recommended.

name: hazey daze
text: The super short owner Jackie hendrix  is disgusting the way he treats his employees will never recommend to friends and family

name: Sherry Campbell
text: Jackie Hendrix is not only the ultimate professional, he is just a really nice guy.  We called him at 4:00 pm the day for our Dickens Festival.  It was about to be rained completely out. Jackie very calmly laid out festival in an indoor facility and texted me the schematic so I could look at it while we talked.  He brought his team of professionals in and in less than 12 hours had us a tent set up with sides, heaters and lights.  He also decks my brothers homes out in Christmas lights every year and they are beautiful.  I have worked with him on 2 weddings and there is no one any better.

name: Georgia Bivens
text: The dinnerware was fine and as pictured. Their tablecloths have yellow stains on them. We rented a tent in case of rain for an outdoor wedding. I would not recommend the tent.  It was worn, ripped and dingy. I ordered the tent based on what they had pictured but it was nothing like was pictured on their website. They do not respond to your complaint either. Not once has the manager reached out to me.

name: Terra Butler
text: Staff friendly & knowledgeable, some more helpful than others. Quick service. Did not call when order was ready & did not return messages. Fair prices.

name: Roland Vance
text: Awesome firm with great attitude! Tech addressed my washer when no one else could or would.

name: Melanie Jett
text: Love shopping local, superior customer service, every person who walks through the door is greeted kindly, and assistance offered.

name: Anthony Spann
text: Great customer service and friendly staff.  Highly recommend.

name: corrie gibson
text: Love Weaver's!! Great friendly people!!

name: Jaimi Tapp
text: Had a wonderful prom dress shopping experience.  Staff was fantastic helping us select dresses and prepping gowns to be tried. They were incredibly helpful and insightful without being pushy. Their experience really helped my daughter make a prefect choice.

name: Linda Mims
text: we ordered a tux. hoping to pick up soon but the service was top notch from the moment we walked in the door

name: Chesney Capps
text: I LOVE these ladies and staff, beautiful dresses and always a great selection, and they’re always in style, highly recommend!!!!

name: Denise Jarrett Norcross
text: Absolutely enjoyed watching my daughter be pampered as she ventured out of her comfort zone. She was made to feel like a princess - and the saleswoman who helped her was the icing on the cake (I didn't catch her name) thank you!

name: Brittany Deason
text: Very good and super friendly

name: Edwin Stout
text: Great staff and plenty of wonderful dresses.

name: Alyson Trimble
text: This is the best place for all your dress needs. Every dress we have bought from here my daughter has won her pageant. She has been in over 5. Brooke is the sales person to ask for.

name: redheaded stepchild
text: Glitz & Gowns carries glamorous dresses, shoes and accessories. You're greeted with a warm smile by the owner and team. If you are seeking a unique dress for your wedding, prom or pageant this is the boutique on your must list!

name: Norma Mealing
text: Margie is EVERYTHING!!!!!  My daughter and I had never been here but am so glad that we went.  The front desk and other staff members were very friendly.  Margie helped my daughter pick out her Senior prom dress.  I know my daughter tried on 30 or more dresses ( no exaggeration) and Margie seemed excited and happy to pull every last one of them.  My daughter finally settled on the last dress that she tried on and is very pleased with the dress.  We actually spent around the same with Glitz & Glam as we did last year renting a gown with another local company. Thank you to GLITZ & GOWNS for everything.  You all are truly the best!!

name: Amber Barefield
text: Very knowledgeable staff and very very polite!!!! Brooke was a great help! Highly recommend her!! We went for my nieces first pageant dress and she was so helpful!!!!!

name: Minah Pope
text: The staff is amazing.  My daughter is plus size and they had a great variety of dresses in stock for her to choose from.  I will definitely shop here for my youngest one and her pageant needs.

name: Kate Ferguson
text: I wish I could give them 100 stars!! Today was our first visit. The Selection was amazing and big, with all different prices from low to high.  I couldn't have asked for better help. From the lady at the front door all the way to the people behind the counter. Everyone was so pleasant and helpful. Lindsey, the women who helped my teenage daughter find the best dress, was wonderful! She was incredibly knowledgable about everything. She was honest which I love. She had us set up from dress all the way to jewlery. We will DEFINITELY be back for any future dress needs. Thank you to everyone!!!

name: Belinda Cook
text: Glitz and Gowns is an awesome example of what customer service represents. They bend over backwards to make their customers happy. Lindsey is excellent at her job and offers great suggestions.

name: MLJ Family
text: Thank you glitzy and gowns for my daughter amazing prom dress. The people there was so nice and welcoming when we came in and also helpful. Keep up the great job. If anyone asks me if this is a great place to come for prom dresses or any type of gowns then I will say yes.

name: Christy Praytor
text:
My daughter and I came into your shop 3 weeks ago for her school pageant dress. It was a wonderful experience. She had never been in a pageant before. The sweet girl who helped us let her try on almost ever dress in her size.  They were kind,  helpful and very patient. Thank you so much.
Christy

name: Faye P
text: This place is magic. My granddaughter  got her Prom Dress from here and it is gorgeous. Seeing  her in that gown really made my day. LOVED IT😊😊😊.

name: cathy stanley
text: Staff are very helpful.  We bought a beautiful gown.

name: Chad Hunter
text: Love these ladies. Great selection and service.

name: Joseph Bibb
text: My daughter Alyxandra, my wife and I came here to look for a pageant dress for her National American Miss formal Wear competition. Prior to coming here, we had looked at other dress stores and they were either too glitzy or too mature. So we finally come here. We tried on almost every dress in the store and we finally found "The One" Even though it was past their closing time, they still graciously allowed us to stay 45 minutes after! The staff was amazing, especially Gracie. There was a huge selection of dresses and you could tell that the staff completely knew what they were talking about! Thank you guys so much!!!

resp.text:
Mr. Bibb,

Thank you so much for your detailed 5-star review. We take our customer service very seriously and believe we out-perform other stores in the area in this regard. We appreciate you recognizing this and telling the world about it!

name: sam childers
text: too expensive and idk if my family can afford 😔

name: George Young Jr
text: To much coast

name: Connie Wambo
text: Great selection. Found prom dress first visit!!

name: Larry Grammer
text: They were so helpful with my daughters fitting I would go there for her prom and homecoming

name: Carla Jacobs
text: Nice!

name: Linda McGuire
text: They are so nice and helpful. Beautiful dresses, a bigger selection would be nice

name: Kelsey Lemons
text: absolutely amazing the people are so nice and they have my type of pageant dresses

name: Judy Cordell
text: Staff was very organized. Everyone was friendly and helpful.

name: Andrea
text: Beth was great helping us look a prom gown!  Very kind, unlike some other gown shops.

name: Karmen Payne
text: Great service.  Great gowns.

name: Bambi Darnell
text: Friendly staff and always the best selection of gowns.

name: Leanna Smith
text: Very nice and helpful!  MANY beautiful gowns!

name: Christen Smith
text: Pretty pricey but they do have gorgeous gowns. At those prices I wish they rented homecoming dresses instead of just selling them.

name: Kathy Strong
text: Very Helpful staff

text: Great team very helpful great selection

name: Zuri Rangel
text: The staff are so nice and helpful

name: April McGowan
text: Beautiful gowns and amazing employees!!!!

name: Amy Archie
text: Love

name: GG gg
text: Good

name: Vanessa Sowell
text: Beautiful Gowns

name: Snowfall95
text: They have a lot of beautiful dresses, and the women were very helpful. I'm a plus-size bride on a tight budget, so I unfortunately didn't find my dress but there's lots of options for others !

name: Jasmine Morgan
text: Absolutely stunning dresses and very helpful staff. Very nice and clean building. Found my prom dress in 30 minutes!

name: Robin Svab
text: Rented an off-white tux and shoes for prom and the sole came off the shoe while taking pre prom pictures. Also the fit could've been better. A disaster.

name: Jenna Brown
text: They helped us, and there were ton of dresses! I love mine, and the alteration appointments were close together. I will definitely come back.

name: Jonathan Killen
text: Best place for wedding tuxedo rental!

name: Olivia Greene
text: I was shopping today and the ladies working were pretty rude and not much help, the only lady that helped was Cara

name: LaDana Burrell
text: It looked small at first glance but I was completely surprised to get inside and see how many dresses they actually had and how big it was. The staff was very friendly and super helpful. My daughter found a dress she loves first visit.

name: Lorie Cornelius
text: I’ve never left a bad review for any place. But I have never been treated so rudely in my life. I’ve bought many dresses here and spent a lot of money here and my experience today was awful. I do not recommend this store.

name: Summer Trapp
text: Ladies were great to work with. I look forward going back to say yes to my dress.

name: Libby O'Neal
text: They've had my bridesmaids dress for a total of 7 weeks now and alterations are still not finished.  I live out of town and now I'm looking at picking up my dress ONE WEEK before the event.  I simply cannot believe that a place that claims to be professional would only leave such a small window for slips and mishaps.  I have texted the bride and now I'm having to look into alternatives.

name: Amanda Craft
text: Great local store to get a prom dress or a dress for any special occasion.

name: ashley brink
text: Ordered my dress demanding I measured 5 sizes smaller that the dress I couldn't zip. Lost this dress, gave me a second a week before the event they couldn't get rid of at the clearance sale. Couldn't get a straight answer from anyone, the owner refused to talk to me. Wouldn't send my worst enemy here

name: Megan Wilbanks
text: I got my wedding dress and bridesmaids dresses from Promenade. The girls that work there are very helpful and did everything they could to help me find my perfect dress!! I couldn't have asked for anything better. Everyone was so sweet and I would recommend Promenade to anyone!

name: Kameron Bramlett
text: Finding the dress was really good! They called me about a month ago saying my alterations were ready, I went to pick my dress up today and they hadn't even started! I live 2 hours away and had to make that drive for nothing !

name: Molly Stockton
text: Loved my experience!! I bought my wedding dress here and every employee and even the owner helped pick out the perfect dress for me!  they helped me decide what was best for me , because I have no experience in wedding dresses like they do!

name: 1shaeshae1
text: I have been an employee at Promenade for 3 years! We work very hard to make sure everyone has a great experience!  I have also gotten my prom dresses from Promenade before I started to work here and I had a wonderful experience!  I would recommend Promenade to anyone!

name: Grace King
text: My daughter ordered 7 bridesmaids dresses from Promenade over 3 months before the wedding. Several girls lived out of state. They only had one dress of each style to choose from and no way to try on the correct size for each girl. They buy their their dresses from china and if you have ever ordered any clothing from there, you would know that they do not use american sizes.  Anyway, the dresses were supposed to be in at least 6 weeks before the wedding. The dresses never came in and we had less than 2 weeks before the wedding.  In a panic my daughter went to David's Bridal and she found a way more beautiful  dress that complemented all the girls. They put a rush on it and they came in in one week! They altered them in 2 days, all seven and was ready days before the wedding! I had to call 3 times, over 3 weeks to get my refund back from promenade. Save yourself the trouble and go to Huntsville Davids Bridal for a stress free  experience!

name: Thomas Segers
text: Was not happy with this place. They failed to call when tux was in and had to pull strings to get my tuxedo for a wedding. Service was in un friendly as well. For the money that I payed the least that could do is call and tell me when my stuff was ready. Caused me a real headache

name: Laura Parker
text:
We went a couple months before prom looking for a dress and we found my dress but all we needed was some small alterations done to it. So we went another day for the alterations to be pinned back and everything. About a month before prom we called up there to know if I dress had been altered. They said no they do it by the dates of prom no matter how early you bought the dress. So of course we ask when our dress will be done they said we would be lucky to get it the week before but definitely the week of. Then we get the dress and it was messed up lucky we knew someone that could fix the problem on short notice.

Personally if I was anyone else I would only buy whats in the store but take it somewhere else for alterations. And try to pay for it all at once so you don’t have to deal with them longer than you need to.

name: Ashley Bolt
text:
I hate to have to write this, but I feel the need to warn other brides about the service I received at Promenade. I would not recommend Promenade for any bridal services, especially bridesmaids dresses. I ordered dresses for my three bridesmaids about 5 months prior to my wedding. The manufacturer estimated a ship date about 6 weeks prior to my wedding. To make a long story short, the dresses never came in.

For more details, read below, but the bottom line is that I would take my business elsewhere in the future, and I recommend that others do the same. The consultants in the store were very nice and helpful, but it's not worth the headache of dealing with Promenade's lack of good communication skills. I guess they missed the lesson in business school that the customer is always right.

When the dresses did not arrive in time for my wedding, they did offer us dresses from another source that were in stock. However, the sizes that my bridesmaids needed were not available. All three of my bridesmaids lived out of town, so having Promenade alter a larger dress down a size was not a feasible option for me, even though the store suggested altering dresses THEN shipping to the bridesmaids. I felt that anyone who knows anything would realize this option was crazy on a timeline of 10 days before the wedding. What were we going to do if the dresses were altered, shipped, and arrived 5 days before the wedding, and still didn't fit?

So about 10 days before my wedding, I ordered replacement dresses from David's Bridal and paid for overnight shipping. I'll admit that the fact that the original dresses never came in may have been the dress manufacturer's fault, but Promenade did not handle the situation well. The owner did not return phone calls when my mother or I would leave messages at the store, and she did not check the status of the supposed shipment as early or as often as I would have liked.

I requested that the store reimburse me for the cost of the replacement dresses that the girls did not want or even like, but they refused. I sent an email to the owner with the invoices for these dresses, and never heard another word about it until I sent another email, waited 10 days, received no response, and then called the store to follow up.

I don't want to sound like another jaded bride, but the truth is that there are plenty of other local businesses that do a better job of communicating with their customers and valuing customer satisfaction.

text: I really didn't care for Promenade. I was hesitant about going here because a friend had bought her daughter's prom dress here for $700 and it literally fell apart every time she moved; the material and stitching were substandard and would rip and come unraveled. Her senior prom was ruined since she was afraid to move and she left early in tears. Her calls were never returned and completely ignored by the owner. My daughter wanted to look anyway. We didn't find a huge selection, and the one dress my daughter liked had sequins missing and coming off the back; the stitching was loose. Not to mention we didn't find much of anything under $500. The girl was very helpful and accomodating, very friendly, and helped us with suggestions. We bought elsewhere however.

name: Traci Guy
text: I am usually a pretty easy going girl who doesn't complain, but I would like to share an experience with Promenade in Tuscumbia, AL with everyone so you can be informed before attempting to use their services. One of my dearest friends is getting married 2 weeks from tomorrow. The other 2 bridesmaids and I ordered our dresses back in December and were assured they would arrive 12 weeks from the time of order. The last dress was ordered December 29th. I called toward the end of March to check on my dress since I needed to make arrangements to get from Tuscaloosa to Tuscumbia for pick up. I was assured at that time the dress would ship on April 13 and arrive at their store in 7 to 10 business days. I called back on April 26th to check on the status of the dress. I was told at that time the that the dresses would be in early this week. I called yesterday and was told the dresses were at the UPS hub in Muscle Shoals and were left off the truck for the delivery and the owner did not have time to go get the dresses. I was assured at that time that the dresses would be in Friday morning and I could pick mine up Saturday with no issue. Friday rolled around and to no ones surprise, the dresses did not arrive. We were again assured the dresses would arrive Monday (less than 2 weeks from the wedding). Call me a skeptic, but I have lost ALL TRUST in this business. We have now come up with a back up plan to have dresses here the week of the wedding from another company. The bride and other 2 bridesmaids have made numerous calls to this business and also been given the run around. Had we not taken matters into our own hands, I am not convinced we would have any dresses for the wedding. I wanted to put this information out there so others can avoid this unnecessary stress and hardship my friends and I have gone through. We are now working with them to get our money back and to no ones surprise we are being given the run around yet again.

text: I would definitely recommend Modern Brides for your wedding dress and bridal accessories. The staff was extremely kind and helpful. I probably tried on at least a dozen dresses and it didn’t phase them one bit. They were so accommodating when I brought my 18 month old nephew to dress fittings and even let me come try my dress on the day it came in even though I couldn’t come in until just minutes before they closed. And the alterations! My dress was very intricate - covered in lace with a fitted corset top. I lost quite a bit of weight between the time we order the dress and when it came in. The top was huge but after she took it in, it was perfectly fitted to my body. I’m also very short but I desperately wanted to keep the scalloping at the bottom. She had to remove all of the lace, hem the dress, and then sew the lace back on. I couldn’t even tell it was different at all! The bustle was absolutely perfect too. I had a great experience and I hope that you add Modern Brides as your first stop when dress hunting. You won’t regret it!

I really enjoyed sharing in all the special moments of the custom made items by your mom. Your headpiece and bouquet were stunning. You definitely have a very special relationship and it was my pleasure to meet you both.  I wish you a forever of happiness.  I hope you will let us post a bridal photo of you on our website!!

text: Cannot recommend this place enough! Kat recommended several beautiful dresses that perfectly fit the event I was attending in early November, & their seamstress made the dress I picked fit like a glove. Thank you all so much at Modern Brides Inc. for your great service!

text: This place is amazing and Ms Pat is like the fairy godmother on Cinderella. She did alterations on my daughter’s dress a couple of years ago and worked her magic. My daughter still talks about it. She hemmed my mother of the bride dress for my sons’s wedding and everyone is so friendly! Stress always runs high during the planning of a wedding but at Modern Bride they always make sure your happy and they go above and beyond what you would expect!!

text: The bridal party I was with had an appointment, which had been scheduled for 2 weeks. When we arrived we were not waited on for almost an hour. There was one  lady trying on dresses and they acted like we did not exist, I believe it was because we were African American, very distasteful and we all have very well paying jobs. This will not be a place I recommend for anyone! Racism still exist, I would never spend a dime in that low rate place!!!

name: Kaitlin Carter
text: Modern Brides has worked with me tirelessly throughout this pandemic and throughout the years have been absolutely incredible. Today, surpassed all of my expectations. Today, Mrs. Pat just proved that going above and beyond for something you’re passionate about and loving your customers is what makes businesses like hers successful. Jos A Banks is where John Michael ordered his custom tux for the wedding in early March. Due to the pandemic, their store closed and we were unable to pick it up upon its arrival to the store. Now, the store is closed until May 30th, even though the mall is open and the tuxedo is there; they’re not willing to work with us in order to find a solution to get his custom tux to him, refund our money, or assist us along the way. Last night, after working 12 hours in the ER, around 9:00 pm, I sent a message to Mrs. Pat at Modern Brides. John Michael and I both were so upset. She responded within minutes, welcoming us into her store, and this morning, only 12 hours later: she had taken measurements, allowed him to try on a few tuxedo options, and had a new rental suit ordered that should be here in 1-2 days. Talk about a blessing! Mrs. Pat has been phenomenal! She’s so excellent with customer service, but also just a sweet person. She has extended the offer to other brides, as well. She knows everyone, and everyone loves her because she’s so precious. So, if you find yourself like me, stuck without options due to this crazy time - caterer, photographer, tuxedo rentals - anything to do with your wedding, please contact Mrs. Pat! You will not regret it. I cannot say enough about this sweet, angelic, Godly woman. A blessing to all of us in this area. <3

resp.text: Kaitlin, thank you for your kind review. You and your sweet Hubby were a JOY to work with. We were SO happy to share your special day with you. We wish you and John Michael a life full of so much love and happiness. Thank you again.

name: Amanda Horton
text: I had a friend of mine go there and when she went and got her there was hole under the arm, dress didn’t even fit, and they didn’t see on her belt plus there was stain on there. I wouldn’t give them business!

resp.text: I am so sorry you did not have a pleasant experience in our store. We wish you a lifetime of love and happiness!

name: Gary Pullam
text: Great experience for my wedding party and I! I purchased my wedding suit as well as my best man's suit from Modern Brides. The ordering process was very easy-the highly educated suit specialist measured us perfectly and received the items in a timely manner. My wife also purchased her gown, bridesmaid's gowns, and flower girl dresses. She was absolutely stunning and the attendees looked beautiful! Modern Brides expertise is out of this world! They also recommended several wedding vendors to help plan our perfect day! There aren't enough kind and gracious words to express the experience my wedding party and I had at Modern Brides.

name: A Google User
text: I had such a wonderful experience with everyone at Modern Brides. I would never have been able to make a decision on a dress if it was not for them. I was on dress #101, before attending my appointment this past Saturday at Modern Brides. I was able to look freely without being over crowded. It was just me, so I was nervous at first because all past times trying on I had way to many opinions. My mom was meeting me later in the appointment. So we went ahead and started. Lindsey was my consultant and she was fantastic. She could not have been more attentive. I was torn between two dresses and by putting the entire look together she was able to make me feel as if I really was about to walk down the aisle and was able to choose a dress! We came back later in the week and Pat helped us out such a great deal, so my Mother was able to get the whole bridal experience as well. Out of my visit to 15 dress stores, I would NEVER choose or refer my friends to any other store! Plus I even live 2 hours away and they have always made my visit worth while.

name: Amber Land
text: It started out as a very good experience. I bought my wedding dress there off the rack because I needed it pretty quickly. The salesgirl was very nice, polite, and helpful. I even felt like I was getting a good deal on the dress. Then I found out the price of the alterations was nearly as much as the dress itself. But I was told it would be cleaned and pressed, so I figured it was worth it. I picked the dress up 3 days before I left for our destination wedding. The first thing I noticed was it was more wrinkled than ever before. It also had spots on it that were not there before. It looked like someone had stepped on it while it was being altered. Also the dress had these fabric flowers on the strap which I noticed still had dust on them. So there's definitely no way this dress was cleaned! They did, however give me a coupon for dress cleaning after the wedding, but considering they may not ACTUALLY clean it, I won't be using it.

name: OJ Warren
text: me and my best friend went into Modern Brides and the workers were rude and snobby. as soon as we walked in the lady asked what we were looking for and we said prom dresses for my friend so she said “ok we will go to the bigger sizes” and she’s not a big girl. she is a moderate size. and she said WE WILL GO TO THE BIGGER SIZES. like ok den

name: Jennifer Eason
text: Shopping for a gown at Modern Brides was a good experience: the young lady waiting on us was helpful and gracious, with that joyful attitude that makes everything more fun. I would characterize the gowns here as very formal, so if you are planning a wedding in that style, I would highly recommend scheduling a visit to Modern Brides.

resp.text: Thank you very much for all the kind words Jennifer.

name: Clara Cross
text: By far the easiest and most wonderful people to work with. I have had the best experience with Modern Brides. My wedding gown as well as my bridesmaid's gowns all came from Modern Brides. Mallory and Ms. Pat took time to ensure every detail was just perfect in all the dresses and have made my experience so very special. I highly recommend Modern Brides!

name: Netxeonne
text: I would recommend Modern Brides to every bride that is looking for outstanding service, beautiful gowns and great prices. I found my gown here and Mallory was my consultant. I can't even give her enough compliments for the way she treated me,all my girls and my family. She helped us for hours.  But we accomplished so many things at one time. She is excellent as a consultant and I can see her as a new best friend.

name: Jillian Adamo
text: Pat gave me great advise in all of the planning in my wedding process! Right down to the amazing vendors I found at her Bridal Show, to her bring my dress to me on my wedding day!! So sweet of her! I could not have asked for a better wedding day! BUT it was the ladies at Modern Brides who made me and my entire wedding party look better than any wedding I have attended, and I am not favoring my wedding. haha, but truly I had the best bridal experience at this boutique the ladies love what they do and it shows!!

name: Haley Rester
text: I ordered my bridesmaids dress from Modern Brides and did not have a great experience. The actual dress buying process was relatively easy and they had a decent selection to choose from. However, they took my measurements wrong and ordered me a dress that needed at least 8 inches taken out of it! I live in Birmingham and had the dress shipped to me (for a very outrageous price, I might add) and when I tried it on it swallowed me whole. It took me several days of calling to get anyone to answer the phone, and once I did get someone they said they'd call me back in 30 minutes. I never heard back. I could then not get anyone to answer the phone again. I had to have the bride's mother go to the store for me and talk to them in person since I live out of town. They then said there was nothing they could do except have me bring the dress back and they would alter it for me (at normal price). I was unable to make it back due to my work schedule, but they were incredibly unhelpful with trying to fix the problem and a pain to get in contact with. It's costing me the price of the dress to have it altered down to my size because the have to take it totally apart and remake it. I'm very disappointed in their customer service and seeming inability to help fix a problem that they caused.

name: Katie Henderson
text: Very nice staff and always will take care of you. So glad I got my dress here!

resp.text: Thank you so much Katie!!  We appreciate the kind words.

name: Teri Hasemeyer
text: I had a great experience with Modern Brides. Mallory was the most helpful and creative salesperson for my dress and the bridesmaids dresses. Pat was wonderful and helpful with the alterations for my dress and the bridesmaids. Even when my wedding date changed, the company was very helpful getting everything taken care of. I loved it and would absolutely recommend Modern Brides for their selection and customer care.

name: Amanda Creel
text: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE! DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME DEALING WITH THESE PEOPLE! Sure, at first everything seemed great, and the employees were helpful in assisting us with picking and purchasing the bridesmaid dresses for the recent wedding I was in. (6 of the same dress was purchased in different sizes). Then came time to be fitted for alterations, and alterations themselves-MOST TRAGIC EXPERIENCE OF THE WEDDING! Myself and another bridesmaid went in a few months before the wedding (as we were kindly prompted to do so); the wedding was at the end of October. The first week in October I was told the alterations had not begun as they had not received all the fittings yet (which they HAD!). I was also told I did not come in soon enough, I kindly reminded them I had been in at least two months prior. Later that day, another bridesmaid called and was told alterations were currently being performed and they would be done soon. Over a week later I called and was told my dress was finished, AND HAD BEEN FINISHED and they were waiting on me to come pick it up. However, no one at that store was gracious enough to give me a phone call letting me know the dress was ready. Other bridesmaids were told their dress was ready when it wasn't; or that their dress was not ready when it was. Alterations were also extremely overpriced for the experience that we had.. Not to mention they looked bad. Please, if you value your sanity, your money, and your relationships with the people in your wedding, DO NOT SHOP HERE, you're better off making your own dress. Heck, a monkey and a sewing machine would probably be less stressful and more helpful.

name: Jennifer Cagle
text: Wonderful selection of dresses and great service.  I was very happy with the experience.

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer for your kind review. We loved having you shop with us!

name: A Google User
text: Modern Brides is very professional to work with. She emails me right away and I have tons of questions. I bet all bride does. Modern Bride employees gave exceptional customer service. I recommend trying this boutique. Worth the travel!

name: A Google User
text: I was very impressed with the attentive staff at Modern Brides. Not only was I able to find a gorgeous wedding dress there but I booked my 12 bridesmaids dresses and tuxedos. Love that store!! & the owner Pat so sweet!!

name: Katherine Riley
text: What an amazing store! I bought my prom dress here and it was very high quality, also the people there were so eager to help with anything. I had no problems at all! If you want a great dress and awesome customer service this is the place to shop at!

name: Rouse Kruse
text: I highly recommend stopping by Modern Brides! I'm so glad I did. Modern Brides was my first stop( my wedding dress ended up being the first one I tried on) After my first visit , I went to many boutiques... ended up coming back to Modern Brides 4x to try on the same dress before purchasing it.   I purchased a gorgeous Casa Blanca, amazing designer!

name: Tina Hudgins
text: After looking at several stores, my daughter found her wedding dress at Modern Brides, which is three hours from our home.  The sales staff were wonderful.  When it came time for alterations, which are not included in the price of the wedding gown, was when the problems arose.  They have only one seamstress and it is very difficult to get an appointment for alterations.  We had a family member pick up the wedding gown and maid of honor's dress to save us a three hour trip the week of the wedding.  When the dresses were picked up they were on cheap plastic hangers, like you get at Wal-Mart, and they were in the thin clear plastic bags, the kind dry cleaners use, with a knot tied in the end of the bag.  We were told the nice zipper bags are only used for the short prom dresses.   I guess that they reward you for NOT spending a large amount of money at this boutique.  This sends the message that a prom dress is more important than a wedding dress.  My family member went to another bridal store and purchased a zippered garment bag for my daughter's wedding gown so the cheap bag we were given at Modern Bride wouldn't tear and possibly let dust or something worse damage the wedding gown.  By the way, the garment bag from the other bridal shop only cost us $10, so it can't be the cost of the garment bags that keeps Modern Brides from providing them to the brides purchasing their gown there, after all they do provide them for the much less expensive and short prom dresses they sell there.

name: Delora Prince
text: It was a little difficult to locate because gps sent us into the construction area. But once you locate the shop, it's a great experience. Very nice and knowledgeable staff and a compfortable atmosphere.

resp.text: We have had several problems with the GPS sending people around the block since there has been so much new construction on the next block.  I am glad you found us though!! Thank you for the kind words.

name: Wade Jenkins
text: These ladies were a joy to work with. I went to two places, knowing I had to get a dress that same day and the girl pulling dresses for me was awesome. I went to another place before coming here and was so upset and disappointed with the service I wasn't in a good mood when I walked in to MB. My mood changed quickly just because of the knowledge the girls had in what was in the shop and by knowing exactly what I wanted. My dress was perfect! I had the alterations done here as well and she really knew what needed to be done to it to make it look amazing on me. They also have wonderful accessories and I found the perfect sash and hair comb that added that extra touch to match my dress. These ladies were true professionals and a pleasure to work with.

name: Ash Askew
text: I walked in and one of the associates were extremely rude. I stopped in she spoke to us and waited till I had a few dresses in my arm to then come up to me and inform me that I couldn't try on any dresses that day and I'd have to make an appointment to come back. I informed her that I lived an hour and a half away and she still would not allow me to try on. Good way to lose a sale. I will not be back or recommend my friends.

I have one every pageant, since I have started having the girls at Modern Brides keep me in mind when all the glitzy dresses come in!

name: Modern Brides
text: (Lexie Thompson and Caleb Hill) The service was absolutely wonderful! I have been to many dress shops and I have never had the experience I had here! Very friendly and helpful!

name: Kayla Huebner
text: Wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone. We made an appointment, but weren’t greeted until we had been in the store for at least 10 minutes. The consultant looked high school aged and was dressed quite sloppy for the job, which seemed unprofessional. After we picked over the outdated selection of dresses, the dressing rooms were a bit dirty and another bride was using the mirrors most of the time. After trying on the first few, she didn’t push us to try on more and the environment just wasn’t inviting enough to want to spend money there.

resp.text: I am sorry that we were so busy when you came in the store. One of our teenagers from the prom department greeted you because we were all so busy trying to finish our other appointments. I am so disappointed that we were unable to help you and that you were so displeased with our store.

name: Kate Hays
text: Buying your dress from here is fine as they have a good selection and the attendants helped me narrow down a dress much better than David's Bridal. BUT I would absolutely recommend you get your alterations done somewhere else. I was very unhappy after both fittings and was glad I had an aunt there to confirm it was not a good fit even though the owner/seamstress was trying to tell me it was. She was pinning for more alterations trying to assure me it would be better, but I didn't like it with it pinned and was terrified at my 3rd and final fitting I would still hate it. I was about to scrap the whole thing and get a completely different dress (crying over the thought of the cost) when my aunt took me to another tailor who immediately (just by pinning the dress differently) was able to get the dress to fit me MUCH better. Seeing the photos side by side made it apparent Modern Brides was not qualified to be altering wedding dresses (see below for yourself - Left photo Modern Brides pinning; Right photo other seamstress pinning). Unfortunately so much padding was already added by Modern Brides that the new seamstress/tailor could only do so much with the top so it was never a perfect fit and I fretted about it at my wedding and am still noticing the ill-fitting in the wedding photos. Modern Brides was professional about returning SOME of the money on the alterations (as another reviewer mentioned - every time I went in the store there was some new charge on my dress and despite paying it every time I was treated multiple times like I was delinquent) and offered a free cleaning of the dress still, but I needed to post to try to spare others from what I went through. Also, a friend had the same experience just before me and I should have listened and NOT let Modern Brides do my alterations.

name: Lea Fowler
text: Staff are wonderful and helpful. Our visit was great and she said yes to the dress!

name: Lindsey Clardy
text: I purchased my prom dress here and absolutely LOVED it!!! High quality dresses and the best customer service! I definitely recommend doing business here!

name: Claire Roth
text: While their selection and staff are great, Pat the seamstress is not great at all. Go elsewhere for alterations because she doesn't alter your dress until DAYS before your wedding. I'm still frustrated with the fit of my dress years later.

text: The store itself is very dated. They carry nice wedding gowns and bridesmaid dresses, but if you are looking for the full bridal boutique experience, then you don't want to go there.

name: Felicia Kantmann
text: I am beyond pissed off, no one who worked there spoke to me and my cousins and we are both looking for wedding dresses and bridesmaid dresses, no one offered to help us Noone even spoke to us or greeted us probably because we were in our everyday lounging clothes but for the fact that we were walking around waiting and looking at them and 6 people cam in and they got greeted and got helped besides us that is UNCALLED FOR!! I wouldn't even give you one star I hated it! Yall are rude and not helpful at all!!

name: S Long
text: I recently went looking for a prom dress for my daughter's Senior Prom. I looked everywhere in my area and she couldn't find what she was satisfied with so while reading reviews I noticed that Modern Brides had some good reviews and we decided to go there. The young ladies that showed us the prom dresses were very nice and my daughter got to try on several dresses. While picking out her dress, all workers were as nice and patient as they could possibly be. My daughter did have to have some alterations to her dress and the alterations were very expensive! We started out with a 20% discount off the dress, but every alteration had a price to it. She had to have the length taken off, three layers at $20 per layer! $60 dollars. $20 to take up one strap. Pat, the lady doing the alterations, said it would be done in a couple weeks. After 3 weeks, I had to call and the dress still wasn't finished. When we went to pick up the dress, 1 week later after calling again, the alterations were aweful! It was to short, the strap taken up was to tight, and the chest area was still to big. The front of the dress was crooked and the side without a strap turned under. When I brought all this to Pat's attention, she blamed it on the way the dress was made. Said all the beads on the dress was causing it to turn under. My daughter's prom dress the year before had the same amount, if not more, beads at the top and we didn't have this problem. She charged me $5 more dollars for doing a quick chest take up and when the dress still didn't fit right, she charged $30 more for leaving the dress again so she could take the chest area up right. She wouldn't even take off the $5 I had just paid her for the seam she had just took up! After another week of leaving the dress again, it still wasn't right. The front without a strap was lower than the side with the strap making the front look lopsided! We left with the dress and still had to go purchase body tape and breast push up inserts! Another $30! Be advised that I did read the reviews before purchasing the dress and until I purchased the dress everyone was great, but afterwards, the owner/seamstress was very rude and non-negotiable. Everything she does has a price! So beware before planning a wedding or prom dress affair with this company. You will be charged for their mistakes!

name: Jason Morgan

text: The owners know what they are doing! They have great taste and  will go out of their way to not only give you the look you desire, but they are also accommodating to your schedule. We have NEVER had a bad experience here and we’ve used them for everything....  prom, pageants, work, gifts! They really do dress the best!! I definitely recommend shopping at Elan!

name: Julie Stewart
text: If I could give one star, I definitely would. My daughter has never been "prom dress shopping", so this was a special event for her. We drove 2+ hours to Elan, and we were greeted as we entered the store. Everything else from that point was terrible. My daughter tried on several gowns and the salesgirl held the train on each dress as I took a photo of my daughter in it - never one time did she ever ask us not to take photos of the gowns. After my daughter had tried on about 4-5 dresses, one of the other salesgirls commented "we don't really like for y'all to take photos of the tags", to which I said I was sorry and we stopped taking photos of the tags on the gowns. I was unsure why, but I assume it is because their gowns are marked up well over retail. After my daughter tried on 1-2 more gowns, an older lady walked over to us and very rudely yelled at my daughter if she was taking pictures she would have to delete all of them before leaving the store. She also said "I know two of my girls have already told you to stop taking pictures". This is untrue, as the only person who had previously said anything was the salesgirl (not ours) that said not to take photos of the tags. I could see my daughter was very visibly upset, so we said thank you and left the store. They lost my business forever, as well as everyone I know that I can tell about our experience. My daughter commented when we left that she never wants to go prom dress shopping ever again, so I am really upset that these incredibly rude girls have ruined this experience for my daughter.

resp.text: This customer was not treated anything but wonderful in our store. She was greeted upon arrival and employees spent hours catering to her every need.  If mistreated the entire time no one would spend 2 hours in a store. Upon entry into our store on the front door and posted at every dressing room are NO photography signs. That is our store policy due to customers like this one.  Once a gown is purchased you are more than welcome to take all the photos you would like. This specific customers after being asked twice not to take photos continued to take pictures of Gown tags and photos of gowns. If you plan to purchase a gown in our store there would be no need to take photos of our tags. All of our gowns are priced the same as any other retailer so you will not find it cheaper unless it is a used product. After being asked repeatedly to not take photos and the customer blatantly in front of employees & other customers continuing to not follow store policy she was asked very politely by the store manager to please delete any photos taken in our store as it is against store policy. No one ever raised their voice at this customer nor were they mistreated in any way.  They were kindly asked to follow the store policy like every other customer. This customer then left our store after taking up hours of employees’ time, trying on our product, finding her correct size and went on resale sites posting exactly what size she needed and photos of herself in our merchandise in our store trying to find it at a used price. We are a small business trying to succeed after a struggle with Covid and customers like this one are the reason we have store policies in place to try to combat people taking advantage of hard working individuals and businesses.

name: Charlotte Williams

name: Bernadette Chapple
text:
My husband and I have been patronizing Evening Out Formal Wear for over 25 years! They provide excellent customer service and quality tuxedos. As we celebrate our 25th Wedding Anniversary in the 26th year, there is only one tuxedo location we would trust with dressing the "Groom". Thank you Evening Out Formal Wear for being exceptional!

~Michael and Bernadette Chapple

name: Marc Wilder
text: Well my wedding day or these pics wouldn’t have been a success without Evening Out! Mr. Salter is top notch with customer service and his attention to the smallest details is the reason I would shop with him again! If any business owner is willing to give you their personal number to ensure your order is fulfilled is A1 in my book! GO DAWGS!

name: Greg Pennington
text: Hey Joseph A Bank, why don't you just sell each individual piece of clothing at a reasonable price instead of clustering multiple items when you pay a lot of money for one item. So confusing just simmer down a bit. I thought that you would like a review with some down to earth language!

name: Andrew Hamiter
text:
I purchased a shirt from this location and came back to exchange the shirt for a larger size without a receipt.  First, I was told that they do not return items that have been worn.  Moments later, the "manager" told me that they would buy it back for 50%.  I asked the "manager", "is it not true that you send shirts to the dry cleaners after they have been tried on?"  He replied, "yes".  I asked, "but, you can't take this shirt back and have it dry cleaned with the rest of them?"  He shook his head.  I asked for the manager and he said, "I am the manager".

they took my information and put it in the system when I purchased the shirt, so there is a record of my purchase.

The last experience that i will ever have with the store left a sour taste.  The sales staff, mainly the "manager", left me highly disappointed in their professionalism, honesty, and concern to make it right.  I drove to another location and they exchanged my item for a larger size without too much hassle.

My advice:  Go to another brand name store for quality service.  My friend, who is a former Jos A.
Bank employee, recommended that I take my future business to Brooks Brothers at the Summit.  I forward that advice to all of you.

name: Robert Levy
text: Great men's clothes and employees. "Regular price" is rediculously high. Only buy with good sale

text: I had the absolute worst experience at the Brookwood Village Jos A. Bank. I used them for my groom and groomsman suits for my June wedding. Every time one of the men would go to get sized or pick up something, I was called and asked questions that were answered by simply looking at their computers. I felt like I was constantly just telling them how to do their job. Also, some of the suits still did not fit properly even after getting fitted. I would not recommend them to anyone!!

I wish I had read the reviews before I went. I had a terrible experience there while purchasing a gift for a friend. The staff at best was indifferent to my presence. When I checked out the salesman wouldn't even look at me or make eye contact. It seems ridiculous to be so upset, but part of the reason I went to Jos. A. Bank was because I wanted knowledgable advice.

I do think the tie and socks I bought are nice, but next time I'll go somewhere else.

name: David Barr
text: Good quality clothing at reasonable prices.

name: Carson Landers
text:
I normally don't do reviews, but I've had so many bad experience with three Jos. A. Banks stores that I'm going to go on an adventure. Here I go.

Part 1:
This particular store was the worst of all. My wife (now) and I walked in, walked up to an employee that was just standing there drinking a soda not doing anything, and told him that we were getting married - that we needed to buy 12 suits for their buy 1 get 3 free sale. That's right. 12 suits. He looks at us with a blank stare and just points off in the distance and says that we can look over there for some.

Later on, we get someone that actually knows how to communicate. He doesn't know how to fuit someone for a suit even though he tries but does horribly, but then he keeps running off to the first guy we walked up to to tell him sorry for taking his customer. We were never his customer to begin with.

My wife and I were completely stressed out after this. I could go on about other details, but in the end we walked out. We were going to buy 12 suits, but they couldn't care less. I haven't had this poor of service in a long time even though buying a suit is where customer service is supposed to be very important.

Meet me again in Part 2 at the Huntsville, AL Bridge Street store.

name: Y Liu
text:
Manager Paul has poor customer skills and called police on me to ask me leave. Paul is very unreasonable and has his sole management discretion about me (Asian and new to America).
Police told me not to come in this store ever again just because manager Paul wanted so for no reasons. It really hurts a new customer's feelings.

text: No one greeted me.  I wandered and left.  The store had more employees than customers.

resp.text:
Bryan,
Thank you for bringing this to our attention. This is certainly not the level of service we strive to provide our customers with and we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Rest assured this will be addressed with the regional and store management team of our Birmingham, AL location for review and training purposes. We’d love to connect with you and make up for this negative experience. If you’d like to discuss this with us in greater detail, please email your preferred contact info and the best time to reach you to at JABListens@josabank.com so we can follow up.
Best Regards,
JAB Listens

text: Patrick is a rock star! His customer service skills are rare in today’s culture. I genuinely felt like he cared. Men’s warehouse has gained a customer for life just because of the way this man treated me.

name: Joe Sanford
text: The guys there did a great job. I felt very attended to. They were extremely knowledgeable about your selection. I give a them a 5 star rating.

name: Mary Derr
text: Good experience. Very helpful & knowledgeable about their merchandise. Had to buy a suit, shirt, tie & shoes for my husband for our son's wedding.  A young woman named Kennedy helped us & she was great! Thought prices were reasonable.

name: Donna Bailey
text: Incompetent is one way to describe them. Went in and ordered my son a 40R Chamois jacket. In 3 days, we received a 42R Brown jacket. Wrong size AND color!! I call and I'm told they'll replace it with the right jacket. I have called 3 times for an update.  First one I'm told it's being shipped from CA. Second time, after being put on hold for over 10 mins I hang up. Call back and a manager, which put me on hold the previous time forever, tells me they can't replace it and Fedex lost my package. I've waited 3 weeks for them to get the right jacket and now I need one next week for my son's senior prom. Do Not shop at this place!!!!

name: Nicholas Davis
text: Staff was super friendly and knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend using them.

name: Ashley Murff
text: Staff is very knowledgeable, versatile selection, affordable. The tape measure around the salesman's neck, I think his name was Adam, the pen in his mouth, his journal, the fit presentations and smiles are a nice touch. :) Great buys, 10 minute hem, no lies!

name: FeC ENG
text:
Overall, we had a good experience at the store, but it was a little odd.

We started out strong meeting a representative, Kate. Who greeted us, was quick, proactive, we liked her. But this other guy cut in and pushed her out. We (myself and the family) liked her. She was respectful, addressed us as soon as we walked in the door, gave us her name, and seemed really easy to work with. The other guy just felt like a salesmen.

We ALL wish we could have kept working with her. I, girlfriend to the stud getting the suits, wish the other guy did not push her out. I wanted her opinion. A young, fashionable, professional woman brings a lot to the table when it comes to attire. I would have respected her input. I hope the company allows her to work closely with clients in the future.

Please note that I have rented suits for myself from Men's Wearhouse so I am also a customer (being a woman in engineering, my friends end up being guys so I end up on the grooms side).

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  We apologize for the service difference you experienced in our Birmingham location between Kate and the other associate.  Your shopping experience should be easy and stress free regardless of who you are working with.  We have forwarded this feedback to the management team for review and training purposes so we can improve.  We look forward to an opportunity to better serve you in the future.
Best Regards,
MW Listens

name: Stephen Ruiz
text: Kate was great and very professional. She made me feel at ease, due to the fact I have to ship my rental to Virginia for a wedding in 3 days. She ensured that I would be walking away with a suit once I got to VA regardless. I'm giving 5 stars now for her great customer service and the overall experience. But we shall see in three days of this service holds true!

name: William Clark
text:
Great staff that knows their stuff! Helped my buddy and us on his big day with suits, and when one of the groomsmen got a suit that didn’t quite fit they rush ordered another and got it in right on time.

I’d definitely recommend this place for setting up suit rentals or just for asking opinions on a good looking tie.

name: Cliff Lumpkin
text: Needed a suit in 2 hours...David got me one in less than 30 minutes. Altered, hemmed and steamed all done in less than 30. Thank you!

name: Richard Arrington
text: They staff at Men's Wearhouse, has great service,

name: Roi
text: Always great service. Needed a quick alteration for a funeral the next morning, they worked me in and took care of it. I have Never had a bad experience there.

name: Mark Whitlock Jr.
text: Marcus Lyles Is the most important asset to your store in my opinion. He helped me with my wedding attire and now has helped with 2 custom sport coats. As long as he is on your team I know you will succeed!

name: Gregg
text: My daughter was getting married and I had to rent a tuxedo. I was expecting to be there for a while but the employees couldn't have been more friendly and knowledgeable. The tux was also unbelievably comfortable. If you need shirts, ties, socks etc. they sell these as well. If have recommended to numerous friends and will continue to do so.

name: Stephanie Williams-Velazquez
text: I went to pick a tuxedo for my nephew. I was picking it up because on the previous day when my nephew went to get it, it apparently had been sent to the wrong store. I get there and someone had picked it up from the correct store and neglected to call and inform him. I get to the place where suit was suppose to be and it is too big and no sizes to fit even though he was fitted weeks ago. It is a few hours until the wedding and this child has to wear this if his mom can't find a suit to match.

resp.text:
Hi Stephanie, we are sorry to learn that there were so many issues with your nephew's order. This is certainly not the kind of service that we aim to offer. We would love to help.
Please email us at MWListens@menswearhouse.com so we can follow up.
Best Regards,
MW Listens

name: Eric Campbell
text: Very attentive, professional and knowledgeable staff. All of my expectations were exceeded. Will shop there again.

name: smjaygal
text: NOT AL ALL CHEAP. That said, this place offers high quality clothing of the suit variety from shoes to shirts. We went here to get my husband fitted for wedding clothes and yes they do that for free and won't throw you out for looking like you can't afford a pocket square. I would absolutely recommend this chain for suit lovers who can afford to drop well over 700 on a full suit.

name: Izz Noland
text:
I have been 5 times already for registering and fitting for my wedding which is now only 5 days from today. My measurements were wrong the first time, so I went back and saw the manager. She measured again and changed everything. When I received my suit for the final fitting, everything was as per the original measurements and too big. They are supposed to overnight my new suit which I'll see 3 days before my wedding.
In addition, my son is very small, and I asked for the smallest fit. He received a regular slim fit instead of extreme slim fit which looks baggy. I was told by the person on duty that they don't have extreme slim fit for children (my son is 11, so I'm paying full price for his rental). I don't believe this to be true and will be speaking with the manager soon. I will not recommend them to anyone else. All of my groomsmen and father of the bride are using them, and the father of the bride at a different Men's Warehouse didn't receive his shoes. I can't believe we're paying $200 / person for all of the hiccups during the preparation phase.

EDIT / UPDATE - My new arrival came in a couple of days before my wedding and fit fine.  In the shuffle, the new order had a white shirt instead of ivory and I didn't realize until the day of my wedding that my shirt was ALL wrong!  Luckily Newnan in GA was able to fix me up.  My mom drove over an hour both ways to get me an ivory shirt.
Meanwhile, I'm waiting on my custom suit.  They were supposed to make up for ALL of this with a "special" custom suit, and there's nothing different about the one I am receiving versus any other Joe Custom Suit.  (mind you there were 7-8 in the bridal party who all rented suits from Men's Warehouses across the Southeast who all had some sort of issue).
I went in yesterday to pick up after my final fitting a week ago, and they had not touched it.  I was told on a Tuesday I could come get it on the weekend.  No calls, no emails, nothing.  So I go in AFTER the weekend and it had not been touched and they said, "wait 10 minutes and we'll have it ready."  NO!  I don't want my custom suit rushed.  I should add that customer service reply 4 months ago gave me a nice discount on my rental, and Kyla and David mean well at this location, but they can't, and shouldn't walk behind all of their employees.
This is the worst experience I've ever had with any establishment in the US. PERIOD. FULL STOP.

resp.text:
We appreciate you taking the time to share this feedback with us. We sincerely apologize for all the errors faced in getting the rental garments ready for such a special occasion. We have passed your feedback along to the upper management team for review and training purposes. We’d love the opportunity to connect with you and make up for this negative experience. If you'd like to discuss your visit with us in greater detail, please email us your wedding group details and best contact number or email at MWListens@menswearhouse.com so a member of our team can follow up with you.
Best Regards,
MW Listens

name: Andrea Bedor
text: Tyler assisted my husband and I with purchasing a suit for our anniversary. He was extremely helpful and loads of fun while we were shopping. He made sure that we were prepared for our special event. They were able to accommodate our very short timeline and they did same day alterations.Thanks Tyler!

name: Agent Phrosty
text: Easiest time I've ever had buying a suit. Zachary was very knowledgeable and understood our needs. He more than exceeded our expectations and helped find me two sharp suits with matching shoes for a price that didn't break my budget.

name: Joel West
text: I had a great visit the other day. The prices are not the cheapest but to some extent, you get what you pay for. I had a store assistant named Marcus Lyles. He greeted me as soon as I walked in the door. He spent alot of time with me making sure I got everything I needed, that it fit correctly, and looked good. His expertise is priceless and I will shop there again because of him. Great job  Marcus!

name: Samantha Hall
text: My husband is 6'2" and 270lbs. His clothes from Men's Wearhouse always fit great.

name: Guy Able
text: Excellent customer service. I visited for a suit fitting and rental for a wedding party and had a great experience. Knowledgable and courteous staff. In and out in less than 20 minutes. Will return in the future.

name: Thomas Weeks
text: Really great service. Met me at the door and was very personable. Great knowledge and knew exactly how to help me. Without a doubt, will come back.

name: John
text: I had a pleasant experience when it came to this location. Everyone was friendly and worked quickly to get our order done.

name: Lynn Rickard
text: Very helpful and friendly, quick to serve and got us in and out in no time!

name: Shealynn Seaman
text: Ask for Caroline Stephen's! She helped us find the perfect suit for a special mother son outing. Can't say enough about her attention to detail and excellent level of customer service! We will be back!!

name: Christopher Godlewski
text: STAY AWAY!!  This place takes customer service and respect to a new low.  Purchased a jacket to wear IN MY OWN WEDDING, was promised to have it in 2 days . . . delayed going out of town just to get the jacket and it wasn't ready.  Had a bunch of items ordered for possible purchase; was told they'd be in on Wednesday and to just come on in.  Thought better of it and called, no sign of them.  Called back on Friday, the items had been there for days.  The Assistant Manager tells me "sorry, I work with a bunch of idiots".  He then tries to sell me a jacket that's not even close to fitting in the shoulders and tells me "I can just get it altered".  Anyone who knows anything about jackets knows if the shoulders don't fit, the jacket doesn't fit.  Tried to order even more items to exchange for a jacket I'd gotten, can't even get the AM to call me back after he again blamed the "part-timers" that work for him.  DON'T EVEN WASTE YOUR TIME HERE.  They should either close this branch or fire everyone and start over.

name: LuckyCharm Gaming
text: Very friendly customer service and very knowledgeable about their suits

name: Echo5191 Cade
text: Got fitted for a tux , it came in a week early so I went to pick it up and  they messed up the color of Vest/ bow tie and pants were way to big , anyway they said they would over night and a week later I just got the call they had it , and they still don’t have it ! My event is Friday and if it’s not in before then  my prom will be ruined! DO NOT EVER GET ANYTHING HERE!! And the staff is extremely incompetent and are Poorly trained !

resp.text:
Echo,

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. This is certainly not the level of service we strive to provide our customers with and we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.  If you'd like to discuss your experience with us in greater detail, please email us at MWListens@menswearhouse.com so we can follow up.
Best Regards,
MW Listens

name: William Dennison
text: Save your time and money. These guys hardly know what they're doing. The only reason I gave it two stars instead of one is that Zack was actually helpful and fixed the mess for me.

name: Charles Worthington
text: Very impressed with the service at this store. The manager, David, took care of us, was helpful with recommendations and was my personal favorite characteristic, fast.  We were in and out in 20 min.  The reviews are certainly not representative of the level of professionalism at this store. Great work.

name: John Thomas
text: Great store! Tyler was my salesman and did a wonderful job. Will definitely use again.

name: Ronald Forte
text: Really enjoyed the service here. Got all my stuff late but they were right on time. Awesome team!

name: Mike James
text: This Men's Wearhouse is a step above the others in my experience. Marlena and Jeremy are both super awesome and they go above and beyond to provide the best customer experience possible.

name: Chris Barry
text: I was impressed. First time to a Bham Men's Warehouse and was reluctant to visit this location based on previous reviews. New management has done a great job working to right the ship. John was an attentive and patient salesman.

name: Jamie Long
text: The staff here were very friendly and attentive. They were able to help us find what we were looking for in a timely manner.

name: Anthony Colón
text:
I am not having the best service to say the least. The buying process was great,  however, we are now almost a month out from my promised date for my custom made suit. Originally, I needed it for my graduation and was able to wear another suit for that event. They said customs take longer than the original date I was promised, May 9th. They said it would arrive on May 20th instead and I would receive a phone call. No call on that date, I called on the 23rd and it was there. They refitted my pants which is great, and the jacket fits perfect, but said it would arrive today, June 4th. It has not arrived yet.

I think the frustrating part is not that I don't have it, but that it is not ready by the promised date they said it would arrive. Perhaps, better communication would be helpful too. I have another event this weekend I would need it by and hope it arrives before the end of this week.

I feel this is a costly mistake on my end and will be wiser in any future purchases.

(Edit: wrote to email from Men's Warehouse a few days ago and haven't received a response.

Today, June 12th, I called the store and my suit was ready for pick-up. Again, why was I never contacted as they initially said they would reach out to me and let me know when it arrived?

Ideally, I would like to hear a response from Men's Warehouse and hopefully give them input so they can improve with their customer service.)

resp.text:
Anthony,
Thank you for bringing this to our attention. This is certainly not the level of service we strive to provide our customers with and we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We would love to reach out to the store and have your concern addressed. If you'd like to discuss your experience with us in greater detail, please email us at MWListens@menswearhouse.com so we can follow up.

name: Mark Cline
text: For both fitting and picking up a tuxedo rental the staff were not only very professional but extremely friendly and personable. They took the time to make sure everything was done correctly and fit to look my best for the wedding.

- Drew, Blake, and Spivey

name: Everything Bham
text: I went for a fitting and I asked the gentleman that if my friend that asked me to be in his wedding was paying for the rest of the balance,which had been the case in the weddings i had been in the past, will i be able to get my $20 back and he said i had like 2 weeks or something like that from the day i came in so i got fitted on Oct.26 and then went in Oct. 28 and talked to a sweet young lady and she said that since it was not before 2 weeks I couldn't get my $20 back which i was not told at the beginning. I used to work in retail and i would always double check everything and that gentleman said he was sure i could get my $20 back. I would not go here ever again cause the incompetence is awful!! I wouldn't have been fitted if i knew i couldn't get my $20 back.

name: Mitzi Matzke
text: Don’t rent a Tux from here. Very misleading regarding pricing.  Zack should not be working in retail!  Would not even listen to me when I tried to explain what we were told when fitted and placed order.

text: Avoid! Go to Patton Creek store. They don't know what they are doing at 280 location. Customer is never right. Only person that was perfect at their job on 280 was Hakim Derkaoui, but I haven't seen him in the store the last 5+ visits. Stick to Patton Creek.

text: Wonderful service. This was a last minute suit rental and they took great care of us!

name: Cory Truett
text: Helpful staff and good selection. I had a great experience with these guys taking care of me when I was picking out a suit for my wedding.

name: Anita Lockett
text: Great service and was so helpful to my husband, who was asked at the last minute to fill in for a groomsman who drop out the wedding a week before.

name: jimmy harrell
text: This is by far the most unprofessional, lazy, piss poor excuse for a Men's Wearhouse I've ever seen. I spent over $800 on a suit then left it to be "tailored" 5 days later I arrive to pick up my freshly "tailored" suit (WRONG!!) Waist was to tight and the jacket hadn't been touched. I had to leave it for another couple hours why they fixed it. Finally I get the suit and it fit like an $800 suit should. They bag it up, offer no apology for the troubles or delay, and send me on my way. I drive 2 hours home only to find that the idiots didn't bag the tie and pocket square purchased with the suit. I call to inquire about it and the "manager" says yea it's here....you can come pick it back up whenever you get a chance I don't really have another alternative for you. Talk about PISSED!!! Save yourself the trouble and steer clear of this location. The personnel from the top down obviously don't know the meaning of Customer Service.

name: Doug Howell
text:
Great service. Great deals.
Got two jackets on a bogo. Tyler was a great help.

name: Channdra Isom Law
text: Marlena and Hayden were very helpful with the process of getting the remainder of our groomsman tux paid off. 10/10

text: This Men’s Warehouse had an excellent staff, friendly and helpful  Marlena,Marcus,  and Katie were very helpful I will be back in the future.

name: Derrick Howlett
text: Everyone there is really nice. The customer service is outstanding

name: Dez Mitchell
text: Jeremy and Tyler were amazing in helping me and my buddy out for our dinner plans

name: Tyler Laymon
text: I have dealt with this store in years past and everything went smooth and as expected. This time however was a totally different story. We are not doing the conventional rent a tux for the groomsman thing, we are buying pants, shirt, belt, tie, etc. for the guys since it will end being just as cheap or cheaper and everyone will have some new clothes. All that said we just wanted to get the shirts from them and buy all the other stuff elsewhere. From the beginning it was a fiasco and it never got any better. They are super nice, but they are incompetent, unorganized, unprofessional idiots. During my last visit the assistant manager actually argued, heated might I say, with a customer. They aren't able to keep up with what's going on and the other employees have no clue what the other is doing. How can you run this type of business without everyone in the store knowing what's going on, so when customer comes in to check on an order and no one on the floor knows what the other is doing. This is extremely frustrating and I doubt I will ever use the Men's Wearhouse franchise again due to this horrible experience.

name: Jarrod Walker
text: I see a lot of negative reviews from a while back for this location, but my experience couldnt be further from the truth! Zach was very attentive while helping multiple customers (including myself). He helped me find some good deals and some styles that help me look professional without trying to upsell me. I can't speak to the other salespeople, but if you go in while Zach is there, you'll get good advice.

name: K D
